pageTitle: GMack said .............: Pro Digital Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   It has already happened in a way, I was a freelance for them for years and now the overnight reporters sometimes carry a small handheld camera and tripod. The big heavy shoulder mounts are falling to the tiny little handheld lay-it-on-your-dash cams. We could string during the day or night, lots of stories purchased, studios were filled with people. Those days are gone. "" I wouldn't at all be surprised if the TV news people begin ditching their site camera people and get their online people to somehow do both, although they often get "free interns"
